item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello, I’m Aymen. I’m an international student passionate about everything related to cybersecurity and software.

Here I will write about my learning journey, whether it be writeups, projects or articles.

I am particularily interested in web security and pwn (binary exploitation).

In my spare time, I tackle online challenges and gain knowledge from resources on platforms like Root-Me and pwn.college. (Click to access my accounts)

Feel free to contact me at erraihani@proton.me anytime, for any queries.

item.title: Retrieving Chrome Saved Passwords
item.description: How Chromium stores saved passwords on Linux and how they can be decrypted under local attacker assumptions.
